p: This research was supported in part by the Intramural research Program of the NIH, National Institute on Aging and the Parkinsons UK (Tracking Parkinsons study J-1101, G-1107, H-1703), and the Medical Research Council (G1100643). G.A.R. receives support from a Canadian Institutes of Health Foundation Grant, and C.L. is funded by the Vanier Graduate Scholarship. D.G. receives funding from Parkinsons UK, the UK National Institute for Health Research, and Glasgow University. J.M.S. was supported by the Huffington Foundation, McGee Foundation, Jan and Dan Duncan Neurological Research Institute at Texas Childrens Hospital, and a Career Award for Medical Scientists from the Burroughs Wellcome Fund. Additional International PD Genomics Consortium funding sources are listed in the Acknowledgments.
